name: Real-Time Stock Analysis
description: A Dataflow pipeline that performs real-time analysis on stock market data.

parameters.name: input_subscription
parameters.label: Input Pub/Sub subscription
parameters.helpText: The Pub/Sub subscription to read stock data from. Format: projects/<PROJECT_ID>/subscriptions/<SUBSCRIPTION_ID>

parameters.name: output_table
parameters.label: Output BigQuery table
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery table to write analysis results to. Format: <PROJECT_ID>:<DATASET_ID>.<TABLE_ID>
